name: INActivateCarSignalIntent
desc: A request to activate the signals on the user’s car.

items.name: init(carName: INSpeakableString?, signals: INCarSignalOptions)
items.desc: Initializes an intent to trigger audio or visual signals from the car.

items.name: var carName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: A name that identifies the user’s car.

items.name: var signals: INCarSignalOptions
items.desc: The set of signals to activate.
